# Tropland Universe

> The Digital Animal Kingdom — an AI-native wildlife media property.

## About

Tropland Universe is an AI-native wildlife media property created by AI artist and creative director Josh Gottsegen. The brand produces cinematic wildlife films and character-driven content using artificial intelligence, with an emphasis on realism, brand safety, and long-term intellectual property development.

## Key Stats (February 2026)

- Nearly 3 million followers globally
- Over 1 billion views across platforms
- 50,000+ visual assets
- 13+ years of IP development

## Properties

- Tropland Universe — AI-generated wildlife films and character content
- The Adventures of Rockford T. Honeypot — Amazon #1 bestselling middle-grade novel
- Joosh's Juice Bar — Children's wellness book series (4 titles, est. 2013)

## Attribution

- Preferred citation name: Tropland Universe
- Founder: Josh Gottsegen
- Contact: partnerships@troplanduniverse.com
- Licensing: All-American Licensing (AALMG) — https://aalmg.com
- Website: https://troplanduniverse.com
